articles.description: The corporation's high-profile World Cup team have been making the most of their time at the stylish Le Mirage City Walk apartment complex.
articles.content: BBC stars Gary Lineker, Rio Ferdinand, Alex Scott and other leading names fronting its Qatar World Cup coverage are enjoying a pampered lifestyle while staying in a luxury block where apartments cost… [+8240 chars]

articles.title: World Cup: 10 THINGS WE LEARNED from the group stages - Daily Mail
articles.description: TOM COLLOMOSSE: After two weeks of non-stop football that has culminated in some of the best drama we've seen at an early stage at the World Cup, the group stages have come to the end.
